attributes.action: Register and license all high-powered electric bikes and off-road e-motorbikes
attributes.additional_details: Dangerous and unregistered electric motorbikes are being ridden on pavements and roads, often by youths wearing balaclavas. They can’t be traced because they have no registration plates. The police have limited powers to stop them as they cannot be identified nor easily caught.
attributes.background: We ask the Government to require registration and insurance for all high-powered electric bikes, and to restrict sale of unregistered or untraceable vehicles.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Introduce mandatory registration and licensing for e-bikes" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742978
